CreateToolTip¶

Tooltips for tkinter widgets.

class openpivgui.CreateToolTip.CreateToolTip(widget, text='No tooltip available.')¶

Create a tooltip for a given widget as the mouse goes on it.

See https://stackoverflow.com/a/3222120 for original authors and improved versions.

Parameters

  • widget (tkinter.widget) – A tkinter widget object.

  • text (str) – A tooltip text.
